competitors.name: John Prideaux
competitors.description: As Abraham Lincoln once said: "You'll find the best offer at economist.com/2020electionpod". Although not being a competitor, John has somehow managed to lose points in his own show.

competitors.name: Charlotte Howard
competitors.description: Creator of the "say three answers and hope one of them sticks" technique, Charlotte is a reference worldwide in classy cheating.
